Help:Node.title: remove
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: remove [clothing]
EXAMPLE: remove necklace ; remove purple tunic
Takes off a specific piece of attire or jewelry. May also be used to unwield a weapon. Note that clothing is layered. If you are wearing a tunic over a chemise, you must remove the tunic before you can remove the chemise. "Examine" a piece of clothing in order to see what might be covering it.
SEE ALSO: ,
